name: Makeworld Lite
description:
Makeworld Lite is the lite version of original "Makeworld" game. It can run on low spec devices and is FREE.  It is basically an exploration sandbox inspired by Minecraft. 

It contains 3 Games :

Mineclone2 : A minecraft imitation in Makeworld engine.

LOTW : Brings LOTR elements to Makeworld.

World DEMO :  Makeworld game but with less features and requirements.

It also contains texture packs for games and worlds

Minimum system requirements :

Intel Pentium 4 HT 3.0 ghz

1GB RAM

400 MB Storage (After installation)

Intel HD Graphics (Baytrail) @1GB VRAM

Recommended system requirements : 

Intel i3 - 4130

4GB RAM

2GB Storage

Intel HD 4400 2GB VRAM

_____________________________________________________________________________________________
